edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.scrum_backlog

Class ScrumBacklogModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.scrum_backlog.ScrumBacklogModel

  • public class ScrumBacklogModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The ScrumBacklogModel class maintains the current ScrumBacklog using a TaskItemList. A new TaskItemList can be loaded from files, new TaskItems may be added, and existing TaskItems may be updated. If desired, the TaskItemList can be saved as a file.
    Author:
    Walker Booth, Brian Morris

    • Method Summary

      Returns the TaskItem with associated ID number.
      java.lang.Object[][] getTaskItemListAsArray()
      Returns a 2D array of objects containing information about the TaskItems in the backlog with the ID number in the first slot, the state name in the second slot, and the title in the third slot of the inner-array.
      java.lang.Object[][] getTaskItemListByCreatorAsArray(java.lang.String creator)
      Returns a 2D array of objects containing the TaskItems that have the specified creator with the ID number in the first slot, the state name in the second slot, and the title in the third slot of the inner-array.
      java.lang.Object[][] getTaskItemListByOwnerAsArray(java.lang.String owner)
      Returns a 2D array of objects containing the TaskItems that have the specified owner with the ID number in the first slot, the state name in the second slot, and the title in the third slot of the inner-array.
      void loadTasksFromFile(java.lang.String filename)
      Loads a TaskItemList from a file with the specified file name.
      void saveTasksToFile(java.lang.String filename)
      Saves a TaskItemList to a file with the specified file name.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ScrumBacklogModel getInstance()
        Returns the only instance of ScrumBacklogModel.
        Returns:
        the only instance of ScrumBacklogModel

      • saveTasksToFile

        public void saveTasksToFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Saves a TaskItemList to a file with the specified file name. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if there are no TaskItems in the list, the filename is null, or there was an error when writing to the output file.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the filename is null, the list is empty, or there was an error when writing to the output file.

      • loadTasksFromFile

        public void loadTasksFromFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Loads a TaskItemList from a file with the specified file name. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if there is an error when loading the tasks from a file.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is an error when loading the tasks from a file

      • createNewTaskItemList

        public void createNewTaskItemList()
        Creates a new TaskItemList.

      • getTaskItemListAsArray

        public java.lang.Object[][] getTaskItemListAsArray()
        Returns a 2D array of objects containing information about the TaskItems in the backlog with the ID number in the first slot, the state name in the second slot, and the title in the third slot of the inner-array.
        Returns:
        the 2D array of objects containing information about the TaskItems stored in the TaskItemList.

      • getTaskItemListByOwnerAsArray

        public java.lang.Object[][] getTaskItemListByOwnerAsArray(java.lang.String owner)
        Returns a 2D array of objects containing the TaskItems that have the specified owner with the ID number in the first slot, the state name in the second slot, and the title in the third slot of the inner-array.
        Parameters:
        owner - the owner of the TaskItems
        Returns:
        the 2D array of objects containing information about the TaskItems with the specified owner.

      • getTaskItemListByCreatorAsArray

        public java.lang.Object[][] getTaskItemListByCreatorAsArray(java.lang.String creator)
        Returns a 2D array of objects containing the TaskItems that have the specified creator with the ID number in the first slot, the state name in the second slot, and the title in the third slot of the inner-array.
        Parameters:
        creator - the creator of the TaskItems
        Returns:
        the 2D array of objects containing information about the TaskItems with the specified creator.

      • getTaskItemById

        public TaskItem getTaskItemById(int id)
        Returns the TaskItem with associated ID number.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID number of the TaskItem
        Returns:
        the TaskItem with the associated id

      • executeCommand

        public void executeCommand(int id,
                           Command command)
        Executes the given command on the TaskItem with provided ID number.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID number of the TaskItem
        command - the command to execute

                              java.lang.String creator,

        Adds a new TaskItem to the TaskItemList.
        Parameters:
